metadata.title: CVE-2020-27663 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In GLPI before 9.5.3, ajax/getDropdownValue.php has an Insecure DirectObject Reference (IDOR) vulnerability that allows an attacker to read datafrom any itemType (e.g., Ticket, Users, etc.).

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
